Name: LU 29 - Landmarks, New 547-Seat Primary School Facility, Bronx (G 240044 SCX)
Title: Resolution approving the site plan for a new, approximately 547-Seat Primary School Facility, located at Block 5841, Lots 1968, 1978 and 1988, Community District 8, Borough of the Bronx (Non-ULURP No. G 240044 SCX; Preconsidered L.U. No. 29).
